nodes.text: A customized blue-and-white Z-95 Headhunter was owned by Count Rial Pernon of Eiattu 6. He customized the engines, as well as painted the starfighter with a blue flame paint scheme. He flew it to assist Rogue Squadron on their mission on the planet after the Battle of Endor.
The Z-95 appears in Dark Horse Comics' Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron: The Warrior Princess story arc.
